title: Winter fish soup with chilli a誰oli

ingredients.item: 1 small celeriac, peeled, cut into 1cm dice
Finely grated zest and juice of 1 orange
100g mixed seed baguette, cut into 4 slices
100g cod or haddock fillet, boned and skinned, cut into chunks

instructions.step: Tip the tomatoes into a large saucepan and add the Italian seasoning, diced celeriac, orange zest and 400ml water. Bring to a simmer, cover and cook gently for 10 minutes until the celeriac has softened a little. Stir in the beans and parsley, and cook for a further 10 minutes.
Combine the a誰oli and chilli paste in a small bowl, ready to serve. Lightly toast the baguette.

Stir the frozen seafood and orange juice into the soup and cook gently for a further 5 minutes, adding the cod or haddock for the final 2 minutes of cooking, until cooked through and piping hot. Add a splash more water to loosen if needed. Season. Ladle into shallow bowls. Stir a little of the a誰oli into the soup and serve with the baguette slices.
